item.title: Getting area of WGS-84 geometries in SqKm
item.description: Getting area of geometries in WGS-84/EPSG:4326 in square kilometers: 1 2 3 4 SELECT ST_Area(geometry, false) / 10^6 sq_km FROM my_table
